attributes.action: Government to resign because nearly 100,000 deaths caused by  austerity measures
attributes.additional_details: UN website, office of budget responsibility, News programmes
attributes.background: I want Parliament to have a vote of no confidence in this government and force them to resign. Because of the backdoor privatisiastion of the NHS. with NHS funds going to agencies which profit from money intended for the NHS. 100,000 or so deaths caused by austerity measures. Tax breaks for the rich

rejection.details: The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
